name: Order Up (NextGenKieran)
description:
Play as the chef of a restaurant who has to fulfil a customers order by catching food that falls from above. It features 2D pixel art and animation and is played with either the WASD or arrow keys.

Credits:

Kieran Rice - Programming and Implementation

Roya Taylor - Art and Game Design
